name: Crozzy Rats
description:
You are a mouse who tries to cross an office and to get his food without anyone seeing him, as a player you can help him by activating different places in the office and cause mayhem. You can activate a printer, dump the paints, turn on the radio.

A  game for the Brakeys Game Jam 2021.2 with the theme "Let Theme Be Chaos"

Controls:

  • Left Click to interact with objects 
  • Pan Camera: WASD keys
  • Rotate Camera Q and E keys
  • SPACE to move the Player
